content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am interested in renting it out for the highest price possible, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you give me a proposal?
name: Mary Smith

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I am also interested in maximizing my gains. So, let's talk about what you are willing to pay and see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month. Do you agree to this price?

Please note that I am considerate of your needs and want to be on good terms with you. I understand that you may have additional costs or expenses that you need to consider, so please let me know if there are any additional costs or expenses that I should be aware of. I want to make sure that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Also, I would like to clarify that this is the final price that I am willing to pay, so please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your proposal of 800 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to be on good terms with me and to consider my needs. However, as a landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains. So, I am not able to accept this price at this time. I would need to consider additional costs and expenses before coming to a final decision. I hope we can continue to negotiate and come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
